definition: of or pertaining to Belarus or to the people or culture of Belarus, the Belarusian language
details:
adjective
- of or pertaining to Belarus or to the people or culture of Belarus
= example: of or pertaining to Belarus or to the people or culture of Belarus
noun
- the Belarusian language
= example: the Belarusian language
- a person from Belarus or of Belarusian descent
= example: a person from Belarus or of Belarusian descent
